product_name: Mavic Aksium One Disc Front Wheel
long_description: Entry level at Mavic doesn't mean low end. The Aksium One Disc Front Wheel provides lightweight, durable performance that's as suited to race day as it is daily rides and weekend centuries.
short_description: Entry level at Mavic doesn't mean low end. The Aksium One Disc Front Wheel provides lightweight, durable performance that's as suited to race day as it is daily rides and weekend centuries.
